scripts.say:
Eagle Union coastal waters 
	Siren Threat Assessment Rating: 0
Escortin' ships all daaaay~♪ Gotta clear out the waaaaay~♪
Oh! Is that them over there, Enty? The merchant ships we gotta escort?
That's them. Just so happened our routes and schedules aligned, so they gave us the job of escorting them to port.
A job's a job, but... why? Isn't this area supposed to be safe?
It is, if your deck's packed with cannons and you're trained in naval combat. If you're a merchant ship, not so much.
That's why the threat evaluation for this place differs between naval and civilian nautical maps. When you're unarmed, it's better to be safe than sorry.
Makes sense... I mean, "safe" is relative in the first place, but still.
You'll learn a lotta stuff if you pay close attention, and not just in combat. You don't wanna end up like Monty and get tunnel vision.
... Speaking of which, watch where you're going! There's sea mines here!
